short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bigboxsearch helps you easily change and set your default search engine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bigboxsearch helps you easily change and set your default search engine.
Bigboxsearch is a free Chrome browser extension that enables you to change and set your default search engine in a very simple and easy way, different from your usual search engine, you are able to quickly search more than one search engine with ease. it’s good to try more than one to find what you are looking for. 

By clicking “Add to Chrome”, you accept and agree to install the Bigboxsearch extension, set the Chrome Default Search to Bigboxsearch Search and adhere to the Terms and Privacy Policy.
